item.title: Wikimedia Foundation Challenges UK Online Safety Act Regulations – Wikimedia Foundation
item.description: Next week, on 22 and 23 July 2025, the High Court of Justice in London will hear the Wikimedia Foundation's legal challenge to the Categorisation Regulations of the United Kingdom (UK)'s Online Safety Act (OSA).
